name: Overworld (zinnerzPT, NamiHikari)
description:
A simple and short platformer where you collect all 3 coins and head to the exit, but not everything is as it seems.

This game was made for the Nokia 3310 Jam 2.

Controls:
  • AS / Arrow Keys - Move
  • Spacebar - Jump
Team:
  • Francisco Domingues
  • Rita Macedo
